mapper.select: SELECT seq, lastName, name, naverId, memo, nickname FROM member where 1=1 order by seq desc
select seq, lastName FROM member WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq} ORDER BY seq DESC
select seq, name FROM member WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq} ORDER BY seq DESC
select seq, naverId FROM member WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq} ORDER BY seq DESC
select seq, memo FROM member WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq} ORDER BY seq DESC
